reference_summary:
Logan
Hugh Jackman  (Actor),     Patrick Stewart  (Actor),     James Mangold  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
["It's the year 2029, and much of the world's mutant population has succumbed to a genocidal, man-made virus. As a down-and-out Logan (Hugh Jackman, in his final appearance as the character) comes to terms with his failing healing factor, he and an ailing Charles Xavier (Patrick Stewart) must protect Laura (Dafne Keen)-a young genetically bred mutant with powers similar to Logan's-from the evil organization that created her. With Richard E. Grant, Boyd Holbrook, Stephen Merchant."]

Spirited Away [Blu-ray]
Daveigh Chase  (Actor),     Lauren Holly  (Actor),     Hayao Miyazaki  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
["From Hayao Miyazaki, one of the most celebrated filmmakers in the history of animated cinema, comes the Oscar(R)-winning triumph (2002, Best Animated Feature Film), filled with astonishing beauty and epic adventure, a dazzling masterpiece for the ages. SPIRITED AWAY is a wondrous fantasy about a young girl, Chihiro, trapped in a strange new world of spirits. When her parents undergo a mysterious transformation, she must call on the courage she never knew she had to free herself and return her family to the outside world. an unforgettable story, brimming with creativity, SPIRITED AWAY will take you on a journey beyond your imagination. It's a fantastic tale the whole family will want to experience over and over again on Disney Blu-ray!"]

Various  (Actor, Director)    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, TV
['Doctor Who: S10 Part1 (BD)', 'Doctor Who Series 10 will see Peter Capaldi embark on his thrilling final chapter as the Twelfth Doctor as well as the introduction of brand new companion Pearl Mackie as Bill Potts and the return of Matt Lucas as Nardole. Fantastic adventures and terrifying monsters await the team of heroes as they journey through space and time in this latest instalment of the globally-renowned drama. Expect laughter, danger and exhilarating escapades in this final series under the helm of lead writer and executive producer Steven Moffat.', ']]>']

Assassin’s Creed: Lineage
Romano Orzari  (Actor),     Yves Simoneau  (Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
["ASSASSIN’S CREED: LINEAGE is the first chapter of Ezio Auditore’s story and the prequel movie to Assassin’s Creed II, Assassin’s Creed: Brotherhood, and Assassin’s Creed: Revelations video games. ASSASSIN’S CREED: LINEAGE reveals the machinations of 15th-century Italy through the actions of Ezio's father, Giovanni. When the Duke of Milan is brutally murdered, the Assassin Giovanni Auditore is dispatched to investigate. What he uncovers implicates Italy's most powerful families reaching all the way back to the Vatican itself. As Giovanni draws closer to the truth, he becomes hunted himself. He must expose the conspirators before he joins their ever-growing list of victims."]

Doctor Who: The Complete Eleventh Series (Blu-ray)
Various  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, TV
['The brand new series of Doctor Who marks the arrival of Jodie Whittaker, the 13th Doctor – a super-smart force of nature – alongside a new team of friends. Already highly anticipated, the new-look series heralds a brand-new era for Doctor Who with a world-class team at the helm led by showrunner Chris Chibnall. The show will be full of action and adventure, humor and thrills, an unmissable adventure across all of space and time.']
{'Genre': 'Drama, Science Fiction', 'Format': 'NTSC, Blu-ray', 'Contributor': 'Various', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '3', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, Blu-ray', 'Run time': '8 hours and 41 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 29, 2019', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Studio': 'Studio Distribution Services', 'Number of discs': '3'}
I absolutely love the new Doctor.  I think most of the new story lines are well conceive and written.  Way to go BBC.  I noticed there are a lot of nay sayers about the new doctor.  Not sure why, I can't see any of their criticism.  I think its a lot like trying to talk to a trump supporter, they don't make any sense.  Just saying . . . . .
Love new Doctor

profile:
**User Summary:**

This user has a strong preference for action and adventure films, particularly within the superhero genre, and enjoys high-quality animated features. They favor Blu-ray formats for enhanced clarity and detail, indicating an appreciation for visually striking content. Recently, they have shown enthusiasm for long-standing science fiction narratives, highlighting a love for imaginative storytelling that balances entertainment with emotional depth and development.

Their latest interactions reveal a significant interest in television series, particularly those that blend humor and thrilling adventures within a science fiction framework. They maintain an engaged approach to series that deliver exhilarating escapades and character-driven plots, reinforcing their attraction to diverse storytelling formats. The user recently expressed high satisfaction with a nostalgic series featuring beloved hosts, resulting in a perfect rating, which underscores their appreciation for fresh narratives and charismatic characters.

Despite their favorable reviews, the user maintains a discerning eye for production quality and does not hesitate to express dissatisfaction with content that falls short of their expectations. They remain committed to seeking out richly crafted experiences that resonate beyond superficial engagement, favoring both classic genres and innovative narratives that enrich their film and television repertoire. Overall, the user continues to evolve their tastes while cherishing content that combines both quality production and engaging storytelling elements.
